metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26499 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: An SSRF issue was discovered in Asterisk through 19.x. When using STIR/SHAKEN, it's possible to send arbitrary requests (such as GET) to interfaces such as localhost by using the Identity header. This is fixed in 16.25.2, 18.11.2, and 19.3.2.

criterions.comment: asterisk package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
